aboutusintro.title: About ABC Brass
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering Since 1998
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1998, ABC Brass has been a leading precision forging manufacturer dedicated to delivering high-quality custom components. Our expansive 30,000 sq ft facility and advanced manufacturing capabilities enable us to serve diverse industrial sectors with exceptional engineering solutions.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: ABC Brass consistently delivers precision components that exceed our stringent quality requirements. Their technical expertise and reliability make them our preferred forging partner.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: The team at ABC Brass understands our complex manufacturing needs and provides customized forging solutions with remarkable accuracy and efficiency.
